attributes.action: Keep mototway speed limits as they are.
attributes.additional_details: Motorway speed limits should be left as they are.The transport minister should adderess the real problem which is the volume of traffic.If you increase the speed you need to check your tyre pressures regualy.service the vehicle corectley.Not drive when tired and know how to control a vehicle in a high speed skid,and be a good judge of distence and finaly traveling at 70mph or just under saves fuel.
